sections.heading: notices by the department required by the motor fuel laws shall be mailed or electronically transmitted to the address of the licensee or permitholder as shown on the records of the department

sections.text:
66-1423.Notice.

All notices by the department required by the motor fuel laws shall be mailed or electronically transmitted to the address of the licensee or permitholder as shown on the records of the department.

SourceLaws 2018, LB177, ยง 9.
